title: Gift Card
body:
So, I bought a gift card today with intention to buy RP.
But I keep getting declined for whatever reason.
Keeps asking me for Card holder name, but then again it's a gift card, I tried entering my name, didn't help.
So, are gift cards disabled for purchases or what ?
I've exceeded the maximum attempts for today anyways, I'm honestly tilted. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: You may need to enter in the name displayed on the card if there is one. If you're still having problems by now, I'd hit up the billing agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with a picture of the card so they can figure out what you might be doing wrong.

There is no name displayed on the card, sir.
I can't attempt to purchase RP yet 'cause I've exceeded the amount of attempts last night.
I'll give it another try in a few hours and I'll let you know what happens, then we'll go from there if anything bad happens I'll just submit a ticket.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Edit: I've contacted support with a ticket.
